body_html:
Hi, It is using GPU 0 based on following:

Creating TensorFlow device (/device:GPU:0) -> (device: 0, name: GeForce 940MX, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0, compute capability: 5.0)

You can always use CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES or tf.device to specify GPU1.

os.environ["CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES"]="1"
body_text:
Hi, It is using GPU 0 based on following:
Creating TensorFlow device (/device:GPU:0) -> (device: 0, name: GeForce 940MX, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0, compute capability: 5.0)
You can always use CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES or tf.device to specify GPU1.
os.environ["CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES"]="1"
body:
Hi, It is using GPU 0 based on following:

`Creating TensorFlow device (/device:GPU:0) -> (device: 0, name: GeForce 940MX, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0, compute capability: 5.0)`

You can always use CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES or tf.device to specify GPU1. 

os.environ["CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES"]="1"
